entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
